<br><h4 style="color:#495057; font-weight: bold;  text-align: left">Literature that has inspired us, the list is long</h4>

1. Special Issue 88 in Journal of Fish Biology 2016: [Metabolic Rate in Fishes. Definitions, Methods and Significance for Conservation Physiology](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/toc/10958649/2016/88/1)
Open access.
  - Methods: [Svendsen et al 2016](http://doi.wiley.com/10.1111/jfb.12797)
  - Methods: [Svendsen et al 2016](http://doi.wiley.com/10.1111/jfb.12851)
  - Methods: [Rodgers et al 2016](http://doi.wiley.com/10.1111/jfb.12848)
  - Relevance: [Norin and Clark 2016](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/jfb.12796)
  - Methods: [Rosewarne et al 2016](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/jfb.12795)

2. Methods related literature in aquatic respirometry
  * Methods: [Roche et al 2013](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/pdf/10.1111/jfb.12795)
  * FAS and AS: [Halsey et al 2018](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s11160-018-9516-3)
  * EPOC: [Zhang et al 2018](http://doi.wiley.com/10.1111/jfb.13593)
  * Methods: [Zhang et al 2019](https://jeb.biologists.org/content/222/12/jeb196568.long)
  * MMR: [Little et al 2020](https://doi.org/10.1086/708673)

3. The importance of metabolic scaling:
  * Standard metabolic rate in fishes [Jerde et al 2020](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1111/jfb.14218)
  * Metabolic rate in fishes depending on lifestyle and temperature [Killen et al 2010](http://doi.wiley.com/10.1111/j.1461-0248.2009.01415.x)
  * Metabolic rate and temperature in teleost fishes [Clarke and Johnson 1999](https://besjournals.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1046/j.1365-2656.1999.00337.x)
  * Metabolic Theory of Ecology [Brown et al 2004](http://doi.wiley.com/10.1890/03-9000)

4. Reporting methods of respiromtery experiments:
  * Killen et al 2021 [https://journals.biologists.com/jeb/article/224/18/jeb242522/272132/Guidelines-for-reporting-methods-to-estimate]
    - This publication has an incredible table that serves as a checklist of criteria that should be reported with cited examples (53 entries) 
    - Includes a fantastic, well illustrated figure showing the setup for intermittent respiromtery
